description:
Lock up your trusty steed and “Fahgettaboudit”, that's how good this lock is. With its compact design, this lock has room for your bike’s top tube and whatever you decide to lock your bike to. Reducing the space within the shackle makes the lock incredibly safe and protects it from leverage attacks.

  • 18mm hardened shackle and double deadbolt protect from leverage and twist attacks
  • 8 x 15cm internal shackle dimension
  • Oversized hardened steel crossbar
  • Disc-style lock cylinder is pick- and drill-resistant
  • Dust-cover keeps road grit out of your lock
  • Stainless steel keys are coded and can be registered with Kryptonite should you need a replacement
  • Rubberized coating protects your bike's finish
name: Kryptonite New York Fahgettaboudit Mini U-Lock
